uk.ac.ebi.pride.utilities.data.utils

Class CvUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.pride.utilities.data.utils.CvUtilities

  • public class CvUtilities
extends Object
    This class is used for Metadata Terms transformation, including changes from one particular CVTerm to another type of CVTerm. It also allows to find particular CVterms in a list, etc.
    Author:
    Yasset Perez-Riverol, Rui Wang

      • isDecoyHit

        public static boolean isDecoyHit(ParamGroup paramGroup)
        Checks whether the passed identification object is a decoy hit. This function only checks for the presence of specific cv / user Params.
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating whether the passed identification is a decoy hit.
